target.rawSql:
WITH target_instrument AS (
  SELECT id, name
  FROM instruments
  WHERE id IN ($instrument)
)

SELECT
  o.start_time AS time,
  o.end_time AS timeEnd,
  t.name || ' OFF' AS title,
  'TEM server offline' AS text
FROM tem_off o
JOIN target_instrument t
  ON o.instrument_id = t.id

targets.rawSql:
WITH counter_param AS (
  SELECT param_id
  FROM parameters
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
    AND component = 'FegStates'
    AND param_name = 'OperationTimeCounter'
)

SELECT d.value_num AS "OperationTimeCounter"
FROM data d
JOIN counter_param p ON p.param_id = d.param_id
WHERE d.instrument_id = $instrument
  AND $__timeFilter(d.time) 
ORDER BY d.time DESC
LIMIT 1;

WITH state_param AS (
  SELECT param_id, enum_id
  FROM parameters
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
    AND component = 'FegStates'
    AND param_name = 'FegState'
    AND display_name = 'Feg State'
),

enums AS (
  SELECT e.enum_id, e.member_name, e.value
  FROM enum_values e
  JOIN state_param p ON p.enum_id = e.enum_id
)

SELECT
  e.member_name AS "State",
  COUNT(*) AS "Count"
FROM data d
JOIN state_param p ON d.param_id = p.param_id
JOIN enums e ON e.enum_id = p.enum_id
  AND e.value = d.value_num
WHERE d.instrument_id = $instrument
  AND $__timeFilter(d.time)
GROUP BY e.member_name
ORDER BY "Count" DESC

WITH matching_param AS (
  SELECT
    param_id
  FROM
    parameters
  WHERE
    instrument_id = $instrument
    AND component = 'Emission'
    AND param_name = 'EmissionCurrent'
)

SELECT
  time,
  value
FROM unnest((
  SELECT lttb(
    time,
    value_num,
    2 * (($__to - $__from) / $__interval_ms)::int
  )
  FROM data
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
    AND param_id = (SELECT param_id FROM matching_param)
    AND $__timeFilter(time)
))
ORDER BY 1;

WITH counter_param AS (
  SELECT param_id, param_name
  FROM parameters
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
    AND component = 'FegStates'
    AND param_name IN ('ColdStartCount', 'WarmStartCount')
)

SELECT
  p.param_name,
  MAX(d.value_num) - MIN(d.value_num) AS count_diff
FROM data d
JOIN counter_param p ON p.param_id = d.param_id
WHERE d.instrument_id = $instrument
  AND $__timeFilter(d.time)
GROUP BY p.param_name
ORDER BY p.param_name

WITH param_ids AS (
  SELECT
    param_name,
    param_id
  FROM
    parameters
  WHERE
    instrument_id = $instrument
    AND component = 'TempElecVessel'
    AND param_name = 'FegTemperature'
)
SELECT
  time_bucket(INTERVAL '$__interval', d.time) AS time,
  AVG(d.value_num) - 273.15 AS "Average temperature"
FROM
  data d
  JOIN param_ids p ON p.param_id = d.param_id
WHERE
  d.instrument_id = $instrument
  AND $__timeFilter(d.time)
GROUP BY
  time
ORDER BY
  time

panels.description: For C-FEG it is always 0.0 uA

targets.rawSql:
WITH param_ids AS (
  SELECT
    param_name,
    param_id
  FROM parameters
  WHERE
    instrument_id = $instrument
    AND component IN ('IGP3', 'IGPf')
    AND param_name IN ('IGP3Current', 'IGPfCurrent')
),

daily_avg AS (
  SELECT
    time_bucket('1 day', d.time) AS day,
    p.param_name,
    AVG(d.value_num) AS avg_value
  FROM data d
  JOIN param_ids p ON p.param_id = d.param_id
  WHERE
    d.instrument_id = $instrument
    AND $__timeFilter(d.time)
  GROUP BY day, p.param_name
)

SELECT
  day AS time,
  param_name,
  avg_value AS "24-hour average",
  AVG(avg_value) OVER (
    PARTITION BY param_name
    ORDER BY day
    ROWS BETWEEN 27 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW
  ) AS "4-week average"
FROM daily_avg
ORDER BY day, param_name;

panels.title: IGPf current

targets.rawSql:
WITH counter_param AS (
  SELECT param_id, param_name
  FROM parameters
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
    AND component IN ('IGP3', 'IGPf')
    AND param_name IN ('IGPfOnTime', 'IGPfLeadTime')
),

last_values AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT ON (d.param_id)
    d.param_id,
    d.value_num,
    d.time
  FROM data d
  JOIN counter_param p ON p.param_id = d.param_id
  WHERE d.instrument_id = $instrument
    AND $__timeFilter(d.time)
  ORDER BY d.param_id, d.time DESC
)

SELECT
  p.param_name,
  l.value_num,
  l.time
FROM last_values l
JOIN counter_param p ON p.param_id = l.param_id

WITH param_ids AS (
  SELECT
    param_name,
    param_id
  FROM parameters
  WHERE
    instrument_id = $instrument
    AND component = 'IGPa'
    AND param_name = 'IGPaPressure'
),

daily_avg AS (
  SELECT
    time_bucket('1 day', d.time) AS day,
    p.param_name,
    AVG(d.value_num) AS avg_value
  FROM data d
  JOIN param_ids p ON p.param_id = d.param_id
  WHERE
    d.instrument_id = $instrument
    AND $__timeFilter(d.time)
    AND d.value_num > 0
  GROUP BY day, p.param_name
)

SELECT
  day AS time,
  param_name,
  avg_value AS "24-hour average",
  AVG(avg_value) OVER (
    PARTITION BY param_name
    ORDER BY day
    ROWS BETWEEN 27 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW
  ) AS "4-week average"
FROM daily_avg
ORDER BY day, param_name;

panels.description: High T flash occurs when the filament test line is > 2.7A

targets.rawSql:
WITH param_ids AS (
  SELECT param_id
  FROM parameters
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
    AND component = 'Filament'
    AND param_name = 'FilamentTestline'
),

filtered_data AS (
  SELECT
    d.time,
    d.value_num,
    CASE WHEN d.value_num >= 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS is_on,
    p.param_id
  FROM data d
  JOIN param_ids p ON p.param_id = d.param_id
  WHERE d.instrument_id = $instrument
    AND $__timeFilter(d.time)
),

segmented AS (
  SELECT *,
         SUM(CASE WHEN is_on = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
           OVER (ORDER BY time) AS segment_id
  FROM filtered_data
),

active_segments AS (
  SELECT segment_id,
         MIN(time) AS start_time,
         MAX(time) AS end_time,
         EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM MAX(time) - MIN(time)) AS duration_sec,
         CASE WHEN MAX(value_num) >= 2.7 THEN 'HighTFlash' ELSE 'LowTFlash' END AS flash_type
  FROM segmented
  WHERE is_on = 1
  GROUP BY segment_id
)

SELECT
  flash_type AS "Flash type",
  COUNT(*) AS "Count",
  SUM(duration_sec) AS "Total duration"
FROM active_segments
GROUP BY flash_type

panels.title: Flash counters

panels.description:
Threshold value which is used to distinguish the value of the
filament test line between a low or high flash

targets.rawSql: SELECT 2.7 AS "SpikeDistinctionValue"

panels.title: HighT flash threshold

targets.rawSql:
WITH counter_param AS (
  SELECT param_id
  FROM parameters
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
    AND component = 'FegStates'
    AND param_name = 'HighTFlashCount'
)

SELECT MAX(d.value_num)-MIN(d.value_num) AS "HighTFlashCount"
FROM data d
JOIN counter_param p ON p.param_id = d.param_id
WHERE d.instrument_id = $instrument
  AND $__timeFilter(d.time)

WITH param_ids AS (
  SELECT param_id
  FROM parameters
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
    AND component = 'Filament'
    AND param_name = 'FilamentTestline'
),

value_changes AS (
  SELECT
    d.time,
    d.value_num,
    LAG(d.value_num) OVER (ORDER BY d.time) AS prev_value
  FROM data d
  JOIN param_ids p ON p.param_id = d.param_id
  WHERE d.instrument_id = $instrument
    AND $__timeFilter(d.time)
),

start_events AS (
  SELECT time
  FROM value_changes
  WHERE (prev_value IS NULL OR prev_value < 1) AND value_num >= 1
  ORDER BY time
),

intervals AS (
  SELECT
    time,
    LAG(time) OVER (ORDER BY time) AS prev_time
  FROM start_events
)

SELECT
  AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (time - prev_time))) AS "Avg time between flashes"
FROM intervals
WHERE prev_time IS NOT NULL;

WITH param_ids AS (
  SELECT
    param_name, param_id
  FROM
    parameters
  WHERE
    instrument_id = $instrument
    AND component = 'Extractor'
    AND param_name IN ('ExtractorOptimumVoltage', 'ExtractorUserSettings')
)
SELECT
  d.time,
  d.value_num,
  p.param_name
FROM
  data d
  JOIN param_ids p ON p.param_id = d.param_id
WHERE
  d.instrument_id = $instrument
  AND $__timeFilter(d.time)
ORDER BY d.time

panels.description: Ratio of beam current before flash / after flash

targets.rawSql:
-- LowTFlashBcmRatio
SELECT
  time AS "time",
  'LowTFlashBcmRatio' AS param_name,
  value AS value_num
FROM unnest((
  SELECT lttb(
    time,
    value_num,
    2 * (($__to - $__from) / $__interval_ms)::int
  )
  FROM data
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
    AND param_id = (
      SELECT param_id 
      FROM parameters 
      WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
        AND component = 'FegStates'
        AND param_name = 'LowTFlashBcmRatio'
    )
    AND $__timeFilter(time)
))

UNION ALL

-- HighTFlashBcmRatio
SELECT
  time AS "time",
  'HighTFlashBcmRatio' AS param_name,
  value AS value_num
FROM unnest((
  SELECT lttb(
    time,
    value_num,
    2 * (($__to - $__from) / $__interval_ms)::int
  )
  FROM data
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
    AND param_id = (
      SELECT param_id 
      FROM parameters 
      WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
        AND component = 'FegStates'
        AND param_name = 'HighTFlashBcmRatio'
    )
    AND $__timeFilter(time)
))
ORDER BY time, param_name;

panels.title: Flash BCM ratio

targets.rawSql:
WITH param_ids AS (
  SELECT
    param_id
  FROM parameters
  WHERE
    instrument_id = $instrument
    AND component = 'BeamCurrent'
    AND param_name = 'BeamCurrentStable'
)

SELECT
  time,
  value AS "BeamCurrentStable"
FROM unnest((
  SELECT lttb(
    time,
    value_num,
    2 * (($__to - $__from) / $__interval_ms)::int
  )
  FROM data
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
    AND param_id = (
      SELECT param_id 
      FROM param_ids
    )
    AND $__timeFilter(time)
))
ORDER BY time

panels.description: Count events when HT tank is not ON

targets.rawSql:
WITH state_param AS (
  SELECT param_id, enum_id
  FROM parameters
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
    AND component = 'HTTank'
    AND param_name = 'HTTankState'
),

enum_on_value AS (
  SELECT e.value
  FROM enum_values e
  JOIN state_param p ON e.enum_id = p.enum_id
  WHERE e.member_name = 'On'
  LIMIT 1
)

SELECT
  COUNT(*) AS "Error count",
  MAX(d.time) AS "Latest error"
FROM data d
JOIN state_param p ON d.param_id = p.param_id
CROSS JOIN enum_on_value eo
WHERE d.instrument_id = $instrument
  AND d.value_num != eo.value
  AND $__timeFilter(d.time)

panels.title: HT tank state errors

targets.rawSql:
WITH counter_param AS (
  SELECT param_id, param_name
  FROM parameters
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
    AND component = 'HTTankInterlocks'
),

with_changes AS (
  SELECT
    d.time,
    d.value_num,
    p.param_name,
    LAG(d.value_num) OVER (PARTITION BY d.param_id ORDER BY d.time) AS prev_value
  FROM data d
  JOIN counter_param p ON p.param_id = d.param_id
  WHERE d.instrument_id = $instrument
    AND $__timeFilter(d.time)
)

SELECT
  param_name,
  COUNT(*) AS interlock_count
FROM with_changes
WHERE value_num = 1 AND (prev_value IS DISTINCT FROM 1)
GROUP BY param_name
ORDER BY param_name;

WITH param_ids AS (
  SELECT
    param_id
  FROM
    parameters
  WHERE
    instrument_id = $instrument
    AND component = 'HTTank'
    AND param_name = 'HTTankSF6Pressure'
),
daily_avg AS (
  SELECT
    time_bucket('1 day', d.time) AS day,
    AVG(d.value_num) / 100000.0 AS avg_value
  FROM data d
  JOIN param_ids p ON p.param_id = d.param_id
  WHERE
    d.instrument_id = $instrument
    AND $__timeFilter(d.time)
  GROUP BY day
)

SELECT
  day AS time,
  avg_value AS "24-hour average",
  AVG(avg_value) OVER (
    ORDER BY day
    ROWS BETWEEN 27 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW
  ) AS "4-week average"
FROM daily_avg
ORDER BY day

WITH param_ids AS (
  SELECT
    param_name,
    param_id
  FROM
    parameters
  WHERE
    instrument_id = $instrument
    AND component = 'HTTank'
    AND param_name IN ('HTTankEmissionCurrent', 'HTTankSettingVoltage')
)
SELECT
  d.time,
  d.value_num,
  p.param_name
FROM
  data d
  JOIN param_ids p ON p.param_id = d.param_id
WHERE
  d.instrument_id = $instrument
  AND $__timeFilter(d.time)
ORDER BY d.time

panels.description: Latest value of HT Dark Current

targets.rawSql:
WITH emission_param AS (
  SELECT param_id
  FROM parameters
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
    AND component = 'HTTank'
    AND param_name = 'HTTankEmissionCurrent'
)

SELECT d.time, d.value_num AS "HT emission"
FROM data d
JOIN emission_param p ON p.param_id = d.param_id
WHERE d.instrument_id = $instrument
  AND $__timeFilter(d.time) 
ORDER BY d.time DESC
LIMIT 1;

panels.title: HT emission

list.definition:
SELECT
  id AS __value,
  name || ' [' || model || '] (' || serial || ')' AS __text
FROM instruments
ORDER BY name;
list.name: instrument
list.query:
SELECT
  id AS __value,
  name || ' [' || model || '] (' || serial || ')' AS __text
FROM instruments
ORDER BY name;
